duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop next-generation, highly integrated RF Front-End Modules for mobile applications.
Translate customer specifications into design requirements at the multi-chip module (MCM) level.
Collaborate with RFIC design engineers to achieve best overall performance of multi-chip modules.
Support prototype development activities including evaluation, troubleshooting, and optimization.
Create 3D circuit models using EM tools and run simulations on passive RF structures.
Collect test data and troubleshoot circuit issues using standard lab instruments.
